attributes.action: Law to be passed allowing hate preachers and foreign criminals to be deported
attributes.background: Foreign criminals and hate preachers should not be allowed to continue to victimise this country. They need to serve their time and be deported.

rejection.details:
The Government already has the power to deport people when the Home Secretary has decided that their removal from the country is 'conducive to the public good'.

A court can also recommend deportation if someone is convicted of a criminal offence with a prison term.
